answers.author: Derek Johnson
answers.text:
Tewie,
Please take a look at the "Jobs" section on the Knowledge Network: http://icma.org/en/icma/career_network/home
If you're looking to apply for a job at a city or town government, the best way to do that is through the "Job Seekers" tab: http://icma.org/en/icma/career_network/job_seekers
In addition, we have a "Careers at ICMA" tab which lists open positions at ICMA: http://icma.org/en/icma/career_network/icma
Hope this helps. Good luck with your search!
Derek Johnson

author: Tewie Roux
text: I worked in local govenment in South Africa for 24 years. In that period I went through 3 political party changes in local government. I resigned in 2007 starting my own company called Roux Mdevelopment Solutions focusing on service delivery in the Town Planning Devision. I would realy like to get involved in some of your programs worldwide. On resignation I was in senior position at the Metro as Executive Manager Civilworks. (Mostly facility management) Please get back to me.
